text:
Currently the bin directory contains commandline files for Unix and Windows.  
I've developed a set of commandline files that work for NetWare.  It is based 
on a combination of NCF (NetWare Control Files) and Perl script file.  These 
files are placed in the bin directory.

The files are:  catalina.pl  (perl script)
                startup.ncf  (invokes the perl script)
                shutdown.ncf
